text: Marjan Šarec (born 2 December 1977) is a Slovenian politician, actor, and comedian. He was the 9th Prime Minister of Slovenia from 13 September 2018 to 13 March 2020. He is the current President of the List of Marjan Šarec, since 31 May 2014. He has served as the Minister of Defense in the government of Prime Minister Robert Golob since 1 June 2022. == References == Category:1977 births Category:Prime Ministers of Slovenia Category:Mayors Category:Comedians Category:Journalists Category:Slovenian writers Category:Slovenian actors Category:Stage actors Category:Television actors Category:Living people
title: Marjan Šarec
